item.body: The business head on his top-drawer recommendations that add up to the simple joys of life. I promise this isn't a plug for my company, but I have to pick the Fountainhead by . It shows how one man achieved so much by daring to be different. 'Happy' by . It shows that music can be good, clean and still appeal to all. I love my cousin Vinny because it's outrageously funny and wellscripted. is wonderful as the perky girlfriend. For a snack, you have to try the great burgers at between breads in Bandra. A bar I love is aer because the view and energy is amazing. My alltime favourite is Olive — they have never disappointed me.
